platinum.name: BT Group
platinum.description: In today’s world, safe and secure digital connections have never been more vital. And whilst Security probably isn’t  the first thing that comes to mind when you think of  BT, it is one the fastest growing parts of our global business. We deal with thousands of cyber-attacks every day, so that millions of people can safely go about their daily lives and run their businesses.    We are protecting our networks from more than 6,500 cyber attacks each day, investing over £40m in research each year - and in employing nearly 3,000 people, we’re also the largest private cyber employer in the UK. When it comes to keeping everyone safely connected, We Are The Protectors. Find out more <a href=
